resources.string:
Please confirm whether you want to delete the calendar: %1$s.

This operation cannot be undone, and the events under the account will also be deleted.

Please operate with caution.
Feature not available, please grant us the permissions in the Settings screen.
We need the calendar read and write permission to list the calendar accounts and you can delete the unneeded accounts.\n\nPlease grant the permission.
Calendar permissions denied. We need these permissions to list the calendar accounts and help you deleting the account that you do not wanted. Please, grant us access on the Settings screen.

A open source and simple calendar account manager app.\n\If you are harassed by calendar accounts created by some apps, this app is for you.\nIt can help you delete your calendar account (some systems do not provide this ability).
This application is open source and does not require network or file storage permissions.
failed to open google play or other app store
